title: Bindi Irwin Says Yes To The Dress!
text:
Bindi Irwin has given fans a sneak peek at what her wedding dress is going to look like, and she also may be teasing viewers as to where she may have picked up the masterpiece.

Steve Irwin's daughter posted a picture on Instagram with the caption, "I said yes to the dress."

Related:

Bindi Irwin Shared A Touching Tribute To Her Father With Old Home Video Footage

Get To Know Bindi Irwin's Fiance Chandler Powell

Crikey! Bindi Irwin Gets Engaged On 21st Birthday

If you have been living under a rock, the message is a catch phrase from the wildly popular television show featuring soon to be brides finding their perfect dress.

The show is shot inside Kleinfeld Bridal, the Manhattan-based bridal salon that is one of the world's finest.

View photos

The photo features a dress with tassel looking long sleeves. And, fans get another look at the brides sparkling oval engagement ring.

But, if you look close, it seems she may have actually made the voyage to the store to pick out her wedding dress. In the background, you can see beautiful dresses lined up on the shelves and a few metal chairs.

View photos

In a photo on the stores website, you can see similar chairs.

How great would it be if she was on the show?!

Bindi got engaged to her longtime boyfriend Chandler Powell on her birthday.

View photos
description: See The Dress She Picked Out...
